General.Name: Semen Baturaja Persero Tbk
General.Description: PT Semen Baturaja (Persero) Tbk produces and distributes cement in Indonesia. It provides ordinary Portland cement type I, II, and V, as well as Portland composite cement; mortar cement; and white clay products. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia. PT Semen Baturaja (Persero) Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.
